tasks.label: Build Tesseris
tasks.command: mkdir -p build/Debug && clang -c -fcolor-diagnostics -fansi-escape-codes -g vulkan_physical_device.c -o build/Debug/vulkan_physical_device.o -I/opt/homebrew/include/SDL2 -I/opt/homebrew/include && clang -c -fcolor-diagnostics -fansi-escape-codes -g vulkan_logical_device.c -o build/Debug/vulkan_logical_device.o -I/opt/homebrew/include/SDL2 -I/opt/homebrew/include && clang -c -fcolor-diagnostics -fansi-escape-codes -g main.c -o build/Debug/main.o -I/opt/homebrew/include/SDL2 -I/opt/homebrew/include && clang build/Debug/main.o build/Debug/vulkan_physical_device.o build/Debug/vulkan_logical_device.o -o build/Debug/outDebug -L/opt/homebrew/lib -lSDL2 -lvulkan
